item.title: Important dates are available
item.description: Important dates are now available here. Put it on your calendar!

item.title: ACM MM Asia Site Open
item.description: We are excited to announce the launch of ACM Multimedia Asia 2022 website! More information will be added soon.

item.title: Important Dates
item.description: Submission deadline is at 11:59pm (AoE) of the stated deadline date. Workshop Proposals Submission June 3, 2022 Workshop Proposals Notification June 24, 2022 Regular/Short Papers (Full Track) Submission July 22, 2022 Demo Papers Submission August 19, 2022 Tutorial Proposals Submission August 26, 2022 Regular/Short Papers (Full Track) Notification September 16, 2022 Demo Papers Notification September 16, 2022 Tutorial Proposals Notification September 16, 2022 Workshop Papers Notification September 30, 2022 Last update: January 15, 2022
